title: I Need To Main a New Role
body:
Hey guys,
I'm an ADC main with top as my secondary. I'm currently in B4 and looking to get into B3 by the end of the week.  However, I'm getting bored of playing ADC over and over, but I'm pretty good at it considering I have a 59% winrate on Lucian and an average KDA of 9.9/6.0/7.4 . I enjoy top lane alot with Illaoi but I have 0% winrate in the top lane. Im not very good at mid lane and I'm horrible with jungle and support - and I would like to become a good jungler. How do I start off my journey to be a good jungler when your absolutely terrible in the lane? I find jungling boring asf, because I keep getting killed, underlevled etc.

EDIT: 61% winrate actually :D

replies.body:
Main support. 

Don't let anyone ever tell you that supports cannot carry.
I find supports very hard to play. Any tips on getting into the support role?

> [{quoted}](name=CarbonMini,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EZu4R98b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-14T09:02:40.094+0000)
>
> I find supports very hard to play. Any tips on getting into the support role?

First off pick someone that you enjoy the most. Then focus on warding. Then focus on peeling. Then focus on roaming. Sorry for the poor examples. I'm currently on my honeymoon so not much time.
